languages.text: {n}Между бровей Хейнрикса появляется задумчивая складка.{/n} "Звучит как ментальный поводок ксеносов... друкари способны держать свою добычу на крючке без пут и кандалов — уродуя и насилуя их разум посредством нечестивых инструментов. Твоего подданного принудили видеть кошмар из прошлого, чтобы сотворить кошмар в нынешнем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Между бровей Хейнрикса появляется задумчивая складка.{/n} "Звучит как ментальный поводок ксеносов... друкари способны держать свою добычу на крючке без пут и кандалов — уродуя и насилуя их разум посредством нечестивых инструментов. Твоего подданного принудили видеть кошмар из прошлого, чтобы сотворить кошмар в нынешнем".

languages.text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fetters — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."
languages.original_text: {n}Между бровей Хейнрикса появляется задумчивая складка.{/n} "Звучит как ментальный поводок ксеносов... друкари способны держать свою добычу на крючке без пут и кандалов — уродуя и насилуя их разум посредством нечестивых инструментов. Твоего подданного принудили видеть кошмар из прошлого, чтобы сотворить кошмар в нынешнем".

traits.locale_text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fettles — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

{n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fettles — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

{n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fettles — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

{n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fettles — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

languages.text: {n}何かを思いついたハインリックスは眉間にしわを寄せた。{/n}「認知の歪みのようだ。異種族の仕業だろう…デュカーリは物理的な拘束なく、獲物を捕らえることができる。不浄の道具を使い、被害者の心を捻じ曲げ、蹂躙するのだ。あんたの臣下は今、悪夢を見せるために、過去の悪夢を体験させられているのだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fetters — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

traits.locale_text: {n}何かを思いついたハインリクスは眉間にしわを寄せた。{/n}「認知の歪みのようだ――異種族の仕業だろう…デュカーリは物理的な拘束なく、獲物を捕らえることができる。邪悪な道具を使い、被害者の心を捻じ曲げ、蹂躙するのだ。あんたの臣下は今、悪夢を見せるために、過去の悪夢を体験させられているのだろう」

languages.text: {n}海因里希一边思索，一边皱起眉头。{/n}“听起来像是某种心智扭曲，是异形的手笔……黑暗灵族可以在不靠枷锁或镣铐的情况下，将猎物诱捕到陷阱之中。他们会使用邪恶的工具，扭曲、损害受害者的思想。你的这位臣民被迫回顾了他过去的噩梦，制造出了新的噩梦。”
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fetters — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希一边思索，一边皱起眉头。{/n}“听起来像是某种心智扭曲，是异形的手笔……黑暗灵族可以在不靠枷锁或镣铐的情况下，将猎物诱捕到陷阱之中。他们会使用邪恶的工具，扭曲、损害受害者的思想。你的这位臣民被迫回顾了他过去的噩梦，制造出了新的噩梦。”

languages.text: {n}El ceño de Heinrix se frunce al estudiar la situación.{/n} «Parece una distorsión mental, obra de xenos... los Drukhari pueden atrapar a sus presas sin grilletes ni ataduras: retuercen y violan la mente de sus víctimas con instrumentos sacrílegos. A su súbdito le han obligado a revivir una pesadilla pasada para poder crear una pesadilla en el presente».
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fetters — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

traits.locale_text: {n}El ceño de Heinrix se frunce al estudiar la situación.{/n} «Parece una distorsión mental, obra de xenos... los Drukhari pueden atrapar a sus presas sin grilletes ni ataduras: retuercen y violan la mente de sus víctimas con instrumentos sacrílegos. A su súbdito le han obligado a revivir una pesadilla pasada para poder crear una pesadilla en el presente».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils en réfléchissant.{/n} « On dirait une distorsion mentale, l'œuvre des xénos... Les Drukharis sont capables de subjuguer leur proie sans fers ni entraves, ils manipulent l'esprit de leur victime et y pénètrent de force à l'aide d'instruments impies. Votre sujet a été contraint de revivre un cauchemar de son passé pour infliger un cauchemar sur le présent. »
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fetters — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fronce les sourcils en réfléchissant.{/n} « On dirait une distorsion mentale, l'œuvre des xénos... Les Drukharis sont capables de subjuguer leur proie sans fers ni entraves, ils manipulent l'esprit de leur victime et y pénètrent de force à l'aide d'instruments impies. Votre sujet a été contraint de revivre un cauchemar de son passé pour infliger un cauchemar sur le présent. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Stirn legt sich in Falten, als er darüber nachdenkt.{/n} "Das klingt nach einer mentalen Verzerrung – das Werk von Xenos ... Drukhari können ihre Beute ohne Fesseln binden – sie beeinflussen den Geist ihres Opfers mit unheiligen Mitteln. Euer Untertan wurde zu einem Albtraum aus der Vergangenheit gezwungen, um der Gegenwart einen anderen Albtraum aufzuzwingen."
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fetters — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Stirn legt sich in Falten, als er darüber nachdenkt.{/n} "Das klingt nach einer mentalen Verzerrung – das Werk von Xenos ... Drukhari können ihre Beute ohne Fesseln binden – sie beeinflussen den Geist ihres Opfers mit unheiligen Mitteln. Euer Untertan wurde zu einem Albtraum aus der Vergangenheit gezwungen, um der Gegenwart einen anderen Albtraum aufzuzwingen."

languages.text: {n}Durumu değerlendiren Heinrix'in kaşlarının arasında bir kırışıklık beliriyor.{/n} "Zeno kaynaklı zihinsel bir tahribat gibi görünüyor. Drukharilerin zincirler ve bağlar olmadan avlarını köleleştirme becerileri vardır, kurbanlarının zihnini habis aygıtlarla çarpıklaştırıp ele geçirirler. Arkadaşımız, geçmişine ait bir kâbusu deneyimlemeye zorlanmış. Bu da şu anda bambaşka bir kâbusu yaşamasına neden olmuş."
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow appears between Heinrix's brows as he considers this.{/n} "It sounds like a mental distortion — the work of xenos... Drukhari are capable of ensnaring their prey without shackles or fetters — they twist and violate their victim's mind using unholy instruments. Your subject has been forced to experience a nightmare from the past in order to wreak a nightmare upon the present."
